item.title: Newlywed killed, wife’s role suspected in Andhra Pradesh
item.description:
<![CDATA[KURNOOL: In a chilling case, Tejeswar, a 32-year-old private land surveyor and dance master from Rajaveedhinagar, Gadwal Town, Telangana, was found murdered near the HNSS canal in Sugalimetta, under Panyam police station limits in Nandyal district, Andhra Pradesh.
The grim discovery, made just a month after his marriage to Iswarya from Kallur, Kurnool, has sparked allegations of foul play, with the victim’s family pointing fingers at his wife and her alleged accomplices.
According to Panyam Ci...]]>
item.author: Express News Service
